21.木工とは 素材となる木材を彫って|目的のアイテムを 作ることです。|<br>|木:
Woodworking is the process of carving a piece|of wood to create a desired item. As the wood|is carved, it is gradually shaved, so it is|
|shaped to follow the success line... The|quality of the finished product depends on|the accuracy of the... To execute a|
|woodworking command, you need to be able to|concentrate. If you lose your concentration,|you won't be able to do it, so pace yourself|
|and choose your commands... When you're|carving, you're carving from the bottom of|the grid to the top. If you're not following|
|the grain of the wood, you'll only be able to|carve a little, so rotate your workbench to|adjust the direction... Please note that if|
|the game is interrupted due to a|communication error while you are working on|a piece of wood, all the materials will be|
|lost.

22.大カンナがけを使うと|タテ２列を うすく削ることができます。|細かい仕上げに 使: With the large planer, you can cut two|vertical rows very thin... For fine|finishing...

23.カンナがけを使うと|タテ１列を うすく削ることができます。|細かい仕上げに 使い: It's used to cut a single vertical row of|wood into a very thin... For fine|finishing...

24.表面固めを使ったマスは しばらくの間|何をしても 削られなくなります。: The trout that have been resurfaced won't be|cut by anything for a while.

25.昇竜彫りを使うと 上下２マスを|下から突きあげるように彫ります。|下側のマスが: When you use "Ascending Dragon Carving", you|carve the upper and lower two squares... The|lower squares are carved especially hard.

26.２倍彫りを使うと|ひとつのマスを ２倍のチカラで|大きく削ることができます。: With double carving, you can carve a single|square with twice the power...

27.流星彫りを使うと 左下から右上に向かって|ナナメ２マスを 流れるように彫ります。:
Using meteor engraving, you can carve two|squares from the bottom left to the top|right... The bottom squares are especially|
|hard to carve.

28.３倍彫りを使うと|ひとつのマスを ３倍のチカラで|大きく削ることができます。: With triple carving, you can carve a single|square with three times the power...

29.大昇竜彫りを使うと タテ１列を|下から突き上げるように彫ります。|下のマスほど: If you use "Daishoryu-bori", you can carve a|vertical line from the bottom up... The lower|the square, the stronger the carving!

31.大河彫りは 左右２マスを|左から連続で彫っていく 派手な技です。|左側のマスが:
Okawa-bori is a fancy way of carving two|squares in succession, starting from the|left. The square on the left is carved|
|especially hard.

33.ねらい彫りを使うと とぎすました|会心率の高い ひと彫りをします！: When you use Aiming Engraving, you'll get a|sharper, more accurate engraving!

35.木工の遊び方の説明です！|<br>|木材を彫って 成功ラインに沿うように|形を整:
Here's how to play with wood! Carve a piece|of wood and shape it according to the success|line... When all the squares meet the success|
|line, use the "Finish" command. If you carve|in the right direction, you'll get a lot|of... If the direction of the grain and the|
|direction of the carving aren't aligned,|you'll have to carve a little. Rotate the|workbench to change the direction of the wood|
|grain, and make adjustments to complete the|piece!
